amendment.description: To allow the use of Federal disaster relief and emergency assistance for energy-efficient products and structures.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3004 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 3004 proposed by Senator Murkowski for Senator Gillibrand to Amendment SA 2953. (consideration: CR S2145-2191; text: CR S2151) To allow the use of Federal disaster relief and emergency assistance for energy-efficient products and structures.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3004 proposed by Senator Murkowski for Senator Gillibrand to Amendment SA 2953.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3004 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
